titleStmt.title: The third volume of Plutarch's lives. Translated from the Greek, by several hands
Lives. English. Vol. III.
titleStmt.author: Plutarch.
Burghers, M., engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by R.E. for Jacob Tonson, at the Judges-Head in Chancery-Lane, near Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Frontispiece and other engravings signed: MBurghers sculp.
With a chronological table and list of contents.
A translation of volume 3 of: Plutarchus. Vitæ parallelæ.
Copy cataloged has catchword 'Books' on last p. of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Judges-Head in Chancery-Lane, near Fleet-street
